
module mux32to1_tb;
    reg [31:0] in;
    reg [4:0] sel;
    wire y;

    mux32to1 uut (
        .in(in),
        .sel(sel),
        .y(y)
    );

    initial begin
        $monitor("in = %b, sel = %b, y = %b", in, sel, y);

        in = 32'b00000000000000000000000000000001; sel = 5'b00000; #10;
        in = 32'b00000000000000000000000000000010; sel = 5'b00001; #10;
        in = 32'b00000000000000000000000000000100; sel = 5'b00010; #10;
        in = 32'b00000000000000000000000000001000; sel = 5'b00011; #10;
        in = 32'b00000000000000000000000000010000; sel = 5'b00100; #10;
        in = 32'b00000000000000000000000000100000; sel = 5'b00101; #10;
        in = 32'b00000000000000000000000001000000; sel = 5'b00110; #10;
        in = 32'b00000000000000000000000010000000; sel = 5'b00111; #10;
        in = 32'b00000000000000000000000100000000; sel = 5'b01000; #10;
        in = 32'b00000000000000000000001000000000; sel = 5'b01001; #10;
        in = 32'b00000000000000000000010000000000; sel = 5'b01010; #10;
        in = 32'b00000000000000000000100000000000; sel = 5'b01011; #10;
        in = 32'b00000000000000000001000000000000; sel = 5'b01100; #10;
        in = 32'b00000000000000000010000000000000; sel = 5'b01101; #10;
        in = 32'b00000000000000000100000000000000; sel = 5'b01110; #10;
        in = 32'b00000000000000001000000000000000; sel = 5'b01111; #10;
        in = 32'b00000000000000010000000000000000; sel = 5'b10000; #10;
        in = 32'b00000000000000100000000000000000; sel = 5'b10001; #10;
        in = 32'b00000000000001000000000000000000; sel = 5'b10010; #10;
        in = 32'b00000000000010000000000000000000; sel = 5'b10011; #10;
        in = 32'b00000000000100000000000000000000; sel = 5'b10100; #10;
        in = 32'b00000000001000000000000000000000; sel = 5'b10101; #10;
        in = 32'b00000000010000000000000000000000; sel = 5'b10110; #10;
        in = 32'b00000000100000000000000000000000; sel = 5'b10111; #10;
        in = 32'b00000001000000000000000000000000; sel = 5'b11000; #10;
        in = 32'b00000010000000000000000000000000; sel = 5'b11001; #10;
        in = 32'b00000100000000000000000000000000; sel = 5'b11010; #10;
        in = 32'b00001000000000000000000000000000; sel = 5'b11011; #10;
        in = 32'b00010000000000000000000000000000; sel = 5'b11100; #10;
        in = 32'b00100000000000000000000000000000; sel = 5'b11101; #10;
        in = 32'b01000000000000000000000000000000; sel = 5'b11110; #10;
        in = 32'b10000000000000000000000000000000; sel = 5'b11111; #10;

        $finish;
    end
endmodule
